verse.gurmukhi: md ivic irDw pwiekY kuqy dw mwsu[
verse.unicode: ਮਦ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਿਧਾ ਪਾਇਕੈ ਕੁਤੇ ਦਾ ਮਾਸੁ।

en.bdb: The meat of dog cooked in the wine was, along with its foul smell, kept in the human skull.

transliteration.english: madh vich ridhaa paikai kute dhaa maasu|
transliteration.hindi: मद विचि रिधा पाइकै कुते दा मासु।
transliteration.en: madh vich ridhaa paikai kute dhaa maasu|
transliteration.hi: मद विचि रिधा पाइकै कुते दा मासु।
transliteration.ipa: məd̪ ʋɪt͡ʃ rɪt̪ɑ pɑeɪkæ kʊt̪e d̪ɑ mɑsʊ.
transliteration.ur: مد وچ ردھا پااکَے کُتے دا ماس۔

verse.gurmukhi: DirAw mwxs KoprI iqsu mMdI vwsu[
verse.unicode: ਧਰਿਆ ਮਾਣਸ ਖੋਪਰੀ ਤਿਸੁ ਮੰਦੀ ਵਾਸੁ।

en.bdb: It was covered with the blood stained cloth.

transliteration.english: dhariaa maanas khoparee tis ma(n)dhee vaasu|
transliteration.hindi: धरिआ माणस खोपरी तिसु मंदी वासु।
transliteration.en: dhariaa maanas khoparee tis ma(n)dhee vaasu|
transliteration.hi: धरिआ माणस खोपरी तिसु मंदी वासु।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ərɪəɑ mɑɳəs kʰɔpəri t̪ɪs məŋd̪i ʋɑsʊ.
transliteration.ur: دھرآ ماݨس کھوپریِ تس مںدیِ واس۔

verse.gurmukhi: rqU BirAw kpVw kir kjxu qwsu[
verse.unicode: ਰਤੂ ਭਰਿਆ ਕਪੜਾ ਕਰਿ ਕਜਣੁ ਤਾਸੁ।

en.bdb: Covering thus, the scavenger woman (chi:than) after appeasing her lust was carrying that bowl.

transliteration.english: ratoo bhariaa kapaRaa kar kajan taasu|
transliteration.hindi: रतू भरिआ कपड़ा करि कजणु तासु।
transliteration.en: ratoo bhariaa kapaRaa kar kajan taasu|
transliteration.hi: रतू भरिआ कपड़ा करि कजणु तासु।
transliteration.ipa: rət̪u ɓərɪəɑ kəpəɽɑ kər kəd͡ʒəɳ t̪ɑsʊ.
transliteration.ur: رتُو بھرآ کپڑا کرِ کجݨ تاس۔

verse.gurmukhi: Fik lY clI cUhVI kir Bog iblwsu[
verse.unicode: ਢਕਿ ਲੈ ਚਲੀ ਚੂਹੜੀ ਕਰਿ ਭੋਗ ਬਿਲਾਸੁ।

en.bdb: On being asked about (the abominable covered material)

transliteration.english: ddak lai chalee choohaRee kar bhog bilaasu|
transliteration.hindi: ढकि लै चली चूहड़ी करि भोग बिलासु।
transliteration.en: ddak lai chalee choohaRee kar bhog bilaasu|
transliteration.hi: ढकि लै चली चूहड़ी करि भोग बिलासु।
transliteration.ipa: ʈək læ t͡ʃəli t͡ʃuhəɽi kər ɓɔG bɪlɑsʊ.
transliteration.ur: ڈھک لَے چلیِ چُوهڑیِ کرِ بھوگ بلاس۔

en.bdb: She cleared the doubt by saying that she had covered the meat to hide

verse.gurmukhi: ndrI pvY AikrqGxu mqu hoie ivxwsu ]9]
verse.unicode: ਨਦਰੀ ਪਵੈ ਅਕਿਰਤਘਣੁ ਮਤੁ ਹੋਇ ਵਿਣਾਸੁ ॥੯॥

en.bdb: It from the sight of an ungrateful person to avoid its pollution.

transliteration.english: nadharee pavai akirataghan mat hoi vinaas ||9||
transliteration.hindi: नदरी पवै अकिरतघणु मतु होइ विणासु ॥९॥
transliteration.en: nadharee pavai akirataghan mat hoi vinaas ||9||
transliteration.hi: नदरी पवै अकिरतघणु मतु होइ विणासु ॥९॥
transliteration.ipa: nəd̪əri pəʋæ əkɪrət̪əGʰəɳ mət̪ hɔeɪ ʋɪɳɑs.9.
transliteration.ur: ندریِ پوَے اکرتگھݨ مت هوا وݨاس ۔۔۹۔۔
